column1: claim_greater_lith_desc;Now that we've gained our independence it is imperative to push the borders of Lithuania to our ethnic boundaries;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_banat_desc;With German villages and towns in the area now outside German control it would be in everyone's best interest for them to unify with Banat;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
french_blobmode_desc;There are still French European lands that aren't under our control
column2: we should push to integrate them into our own holdings.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: canadian_blobmode_desc;The current regime demands that Canada's borders be extended and who would we be to say no?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: ah ha ha

column1: greater_yugo_desc;Yugoslavia is yet to encompass all lands of the southern slavs
column2: we must seek out and regain these lands for the good of the people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: persian_border_dispute_desc;The lands of Khuzestan have been dominated by Persia for too long! It is time for us to assert our rights and take back our own!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kurdish_diaspora_desc;Our Kurdish brothers are crying out for freedom
column2: we should bring them into our nation and return them to us;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_bulgarian_lands_desc;The Great Powers have denied Bulgaria her destiny
column2: that of ruling all Bulgarian peoples. Let us defy them
column3: and forge the greater Bulgaria we deserve!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_bosnia_desc;The Great Powers have denied Bosnia her destiny
column2: that of ruling all the Bosniak peoples. Let us defy them
column3: and forge a greater Bosnia by removing the Serbs from the premises!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_slovene_lands_desc;The Slovene provinces of Trieste and Klagenfurt have been under foreign rulers for too long
column2: let us reclaim our land!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_kingdom_of_aragon_desc;The old kingdom of Aragon has to be reconquered for re-incorporation into the state
column2: now we have a chance to reinstate her and return our people to us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_khmer_empire_desc;The Khmer Empire was once the greatest in Southern Asia
column2: let us reclaim our old lands and forge an empire that will stand against the powers of the West.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_armenia_desc;Armenia has a rightful claim on the lands to the west
column2: we must stake this claim and fight the Turks for it so we can unit with our brothers in Adana.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tibetan_empire_title;Recremashion of wightfur cray sharr comensh!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: must recraim rightfur cray!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we must reclaim it from the scum who overran it centuries ago.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_persia_desc;Now that Persia has westernized and become a power in her own right
column2: we can reclaim the lands of our forefathers from the conquerers who have taken them from us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_brittany_title;Staking our Claim on the Duchy of Anjou;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_brittany_desc;Our King has a distant claim on the Duchy of Anjou
column2: and although the time for such royal claims has passed
column3: we still feel that it is a valid enough reason to attempt to reclaim those lands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_navarra_desc;The Basque have remained spread across Northern Spain for centuries
column2: and now that we've gained our independence we should extend our state to all the Basque peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_pashtun_regions_desc;Now that we've extended our realm to the Afsharid Dynasty holdings
column2: we can try to incorporate the Pashtun regions in Afghanistan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_croatian_lands_desc;Bosnia was once an integral part of the Croatian Kingdom
column2: and even today our ethnic legacy carries on throughout Bosnia
column3: now that we have our sovereignty it is time for us to reclaim the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_republican_borders_desc;Since regaining our freedom from the Austrians our people have grown increasingly militaristic and the cries for retaking the provinces we lost to the Treaty of Campo Formio have grown to the point where they can no longer be ignored. It is time to reclaim our prominence in the Mediterranean.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_kingdom_of_leon_desc;For the first time in centuries the Leonese people are free from Castilian rule
column2: what better way to celebrate this than to reclaim our old holdings in Iberia?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_highlands_desc;For the first time in millenia the Assyrian peoples have a nation of their own
column2: let us extend it to all our peoples for the glory of god!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: alaskan_nationalism_desc;The borders of Free Alaska need to be extended
column2: our people freeze and starve in our tiny colony so the only logical choice is to move south.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: second_irredentism_desc;The Italian Irredentist movement strove for the unification of all territories in the immediate vicinity of Italy which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Ticino and Nice
column2: but it also meant territorial ambitions for Savoy

column1: italia_irredenta_desc;The Italian Resurgence movement strove for the transfer to the Kingdom of Italy of all territories in the immediate vicinity of the Kingdom which were largely or partly seen as populated by ethnic Italians. Not only did this include claims to Austrian lands in Italy proper
column2: but it also meant territorial ambitions further into Dalmatia
column3: and Austria.;Le mouvement irrÈdentiste voulait voir transfÈrÈs ÅEla couronne italienne tous les territoires limitrophes peuplÈs majoritairement ou en partie d'italiens. Cela concerne non seulement les possessions autrichiennes en Italie

column1: extending_to_danube_desc;Now that we've regained all our cultural land from the Turks and Austrians we should move to annex the province of Pancevo into our realm
column2: the Romanian minority is eager to join us and the province would extend our natural borders along the Danube.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_nederlander_desc;Numerous groups of our people exist outside the Netherlands currently
column2: it would be in our best interest to attempt to bring them back into the fold.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
